title: Testcontainers on Mac M1 not working
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi.
I tried to use testcontainer on Mac M1 with podman. I did everything as here: https://quarkus.io/guides/podman#macos
testcontainers and postgresql images are pulled but containers dont start. I get

```
ERROR [tc.tes.5.1] (build-29) Could not start container: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Wait strategy failed. Container is removed
```
